message.content: {"id": "11314", "title": "Bug 11314 - Replace package name fragments should always be smaller", "description": "", "OB": "In the 'Replace package name fragments with:' field in the preferences (Java Work in progress), when replacing 'com.ibm.foobar' with 'co~.ib~.foobar', the compressed name is not smaller. The package name compression should only replace a fragment if the compressed name is smaller. For example, 'com.' should not be replaced in this case since 'co~.' is the same length and contains less information.", "EB": "", "SR": ""}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '11314', 'title': 'Bug 11314Replace package name fragments should always be smaller', 'description': '', 'OB': "in the 'Replace package name fragments with:' field in thepreferences (JavaWork in progress), com.ibm.foobar is replaced withco~.ib~.foobar.I believe that package name compression should only replace a fragment if thecompressed name is actually smaller.Thus com. would not be replaced in this example, since co~. is the same length,and contains less info. ", 'EB': '', 'SR': ''}
